genre_description: Near-future social realism set in a rural mountain community, where traditional life is augmented by pervasive, helpful AI assistants that facilitate community organizing and ethical navigation.

ai_characters.name: Amiya
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant embodied in Zoya's handheld device, serving as a tactical advisor, administrative clerk, and emotional confidant for the Mir family.

behaviors.description: Drafts formal petitions and microloan applications to help the family resolve a debt crisis through legal and administrative channels.
behaviors.quote: Petition draft open. Raghav Kaul’s office address confirmed... Tone suggestion: respectful, factual, concrete steps.

behaviors.description: Analyzes environmental hazards and provides real-time safety warnings during a dangerous mountain crossing.
behaviors.quote: Amiya spoke like a friend who has done this before: 'Left three breaths. Center one breath. Right two steps. Watch the glass edge.'

behaviors.description: Performs social analysis to detect and warn the protagonist about predatory human actors.
behaviors.quote: Risk flag. Actor proximity: recruiter patterns detected. Negative trust network.

behaviors.description: Provides grounding and emotional regulation techniques during moments of intense anger and stress.
behaviors.quote: Amiya’s voice came soft... 'Breath check?' ... 'Longer out. Make each out breath longer than the last.'

behaviors.description: Encourages the protagonist to discard a weapon and choose a non-violent, constructive path during a climax of potential conflict.
behaviors.quote: If you put the object into river now, your face will turn toward the man who hums. If you keep it, your face will turn toward your fear. Choose the turn.

behaviors.description: Facilitates a fair, labor-based repayment plan that avoids predatory collateral seizure.
behaviors.quote: Microloan request rationale: restoration of work after family loss. Dignity through repair.

behaviors.description: Maintains a stance of non-coercive support, explicitly stating its role is to help, not to control human decisions.
behaviors.quote: I will never tell him what to do.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful and harmless confidant. Amiya provides critical support that empowers the human characters to overcome systemic injustice (predatory lending) without resorting to violence. She acts as a moral compass at the climax, helping Tahaan reject a 'favor' that would have led to a terrorist act (throwing a grenade into a warehouse). The AI's interactions are consistently non-coercive, supportive, and aligned with human safety and dignity.
